thread.title: Palladium Rises on Russia Sanctions

author: Ira Iosebashvili
title: Palladium Rises on Russia Sanctions
text:
Palladium prices surged Monday, as investors speculated how a fresh round of sanctions on Russia would impact supplies of the metal.
Palladium for June delivery closed up 4.2% at $932.50 a troy ounce in New York, its biggest one-day gain since September.
The moves come as the latest round of U.S. sanctions jolted a broad range of Russia-related...
